Articles.Content:
I dry off Dres, and use its power to conquer Kerbin.

I give the leadership of the Dresdonian empire to the next user.
I sell Dres for quadrillions of Funds and give the money to the next person to reply.

I rebuy the Dresdonian empire.

I give a single Dres-teroid to the next user.

I drop it onto Dres, so it's a tiny little bit bigger now.  

I donate a spec of dust to the next user.

I use it to reflect how the Earth is exactly that, compared to the vastness of space.  

I give Duna to the user below

I strand Matt D. Kerman on it and make a book and movie about it.  

I give the next user KAS, 5 ladders, 1 Kickback SRB, and an External Command seat.

You know that you're supposed to only give amounts of money, or gold ?  

Anyhow I build a rocket to kill a kerbal.  

I give the next user 20 US Dollars.

No, I haven't read the rules recently :D  

I will buy one copy of Kerbal.... Wait a minute....  

NOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOO!   

I give $10 to the next user.

AWESOME. I use it to make little paper houses for homeless cockroaches.  

I get my arm amputated and give it to the user below me :-3

I use the arm to execute a terrifying, traumatic pun revolving around someone "needing a hand."  

To the next user I give a live trout.

Places the trout on my desk, with my other live fishes.  

To the next user I give my brother!

whom I promptly give back to you!

I give the next user approximately 30 septillion dollars (USD).

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-03T22:05:07Z" title="02/03/2016 10:05  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 3, 2016</time> by astrokerb**

I buy Earth and give the rest to NASA and SpaceX, and get them to merge.

I give the next person a small loan of one million dollars.

I hire a person to understand and comment on all the references that people around me make so i always know them.

I give the next person what's left of my small loan

Was it by any chance a small loan of a million dollars? It's ok if it isn't though. Maybe it'll still be enough to build a superconducting EmDrive!

I give to the next person a small meteorite.

Which I put in my collection of shiny things.

I give the next person 1 billion dollars and Tylo.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-04T06:13:02Z" title="02/04/2016 06:13  AM" data-short="8 yr">February 4, 2016</time> by DolphinDude3**

I throw Tylo away, and spend the billion dollars on snacks. 

I give the next person a piece of paper.

I'm not telling what I do with the piece of paper.

But I give three dollars and twenty cents to whomever posts next.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-04T14:41:50Z" title="02/04/2016 02:41  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 4, 2016</time> by Evanitis**

Which, using the smallest font possible, I write a bestselling novel on and make millions of dollars.

I giveth to thee user that shall post next two pieces of gold!

I wait 1000 years and sell off the gold at an astronomical price.

I give the 50 trillion dollar profit to the next user.

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-04T16:04:15Z" title="02/04/2016 04:04  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 4, 2016</time> by Sanic**

I bought the Hoovy for 50 Trillion dollars.

Next user get Sasha( the minigun) and 4.00.000 dollars

**Edited <time datetime="2016-02-04T17:16:41Z" title="02/04/2016 05:16  PM" data-short="8 yr">February 4, 2016</time> by TedwinKnockman66**

I waste all the money on ammo, then I waste the ammo.

I give the next poster 1 bitcoin [BTC]

I spend it on chocolates.

I give the next person $10000000 (Australian) worth of chocolates.

I eat the chocolate,

Since I spent all of my money on diabetes medication, I can only give 100,000¥ to the next user.

100,000 yuan goes to an average car, considering 6 yuan = 1 USD

I give 32,000 spesos/funds to the next person.
